## Describe the Bug / 问题描述

A clear description of what the bug is.

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Copy template to project / 复制模板到项目
2. Run command '...' / 运行命令 '...'
3. See error / 看到错误

What you expected to happen.
你期望发生什么。

What actually happened.
实际发生了什么。
